song.title: The E.R. Shuffle
song.info:
[b]Info from Virt:[/b] The E.R. Shuffle
the First Ever Groovy Compo Entry from Virt (sound of crickets chirping)
-------------------------------------------
Okay, I swore off compos, but this one is too big to pass up (And from what I heard, a lot of fun.) Whoever told me that latter part was right! Whee! A whole week to track!
Of course, being the obsessive prick that I am, I started on it Sunday at noon and finished it Sunday at 9. Ugh.
I hope you enjoy it - this one's made with motion in mind, so get up off your ass and dance! :) And TRY not to die while you dance, because we don't want a repeat of what's inside this tune!
-(Hello to all whom I don't yet know; hopefully this'll be a good chance to meet someone new :)
-Virt/RootMusic (c)1999 Jacob Kaufman
